I wonder about the cultural significance of these dolls
http://www.jhg.co.jp/kokeshi/kokeshi1.html
"originally made as a toy for children of farmers"
[historical] Saitou's mother was a farmer

Kokeshi dolls can get to be very fancy
http://www.siip.city.sendai.jp/kankokoryu/english/product/english/kok
eshi-e.html

I have to emphasize that everyone look carefully at 
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/topic/inside/f_inside2.html
because the bottom image is animated from a block of wood, to a 
face, and to a .....complete doll WITH A FUNDOSHI?!? (^_^) it has 
cute little pants

secretarytocapt3
(giggles)
